message: I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product!
I appreciate the offer, but $150 is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in this product, but I'm only able to pay $85 right now.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you a price of $125
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $125 is still a bit too high for me.  How about $100? It's a fair price for both of us.
I'm not willing to go as low as $100, but I can meet you at $110. It's a fair price for the quality of the product
I appreciate you coming down in price, but $110 is still a bit higher than I can afford.  How about $95? That's a fair compromise and we can both walk away happy.
I'm not willing to go as low as $95, but I can meet you at $105. It's still a good deal for both of us
